summary: The story of three young boxers and their coach who is determined to guide them in a positive direction in and out of the ring.
cast: Sam Doumit|Martin Goldman|Harry Keitt|Randy Little|Tyrene Manson|Mickey Marcello|Eddie Mustafa Muhammad|Aida Santiago|Noel Santiago|George Walton
keywords: title fight|fight|title directed by female|teenager|brooklyn new york city
title: On the Ropes
